name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_242Am
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Am" means the element "americium" and "242Am" is the isotope "americium-242" with a half-life of 6.69e-01 days.
